I did the math on the BE store Urfwick, just to put things in perspective:
150.000 BE; using the same 6,5 multiplier when compared to RP, that gives ~23077 RP.
23077 RP = about 130 EUR, or just above 151 USD.

So they now charge the equivalent of 130 EUR for something that did cost 0,03 EUR (5 RP) once upon a time.

Well, by comparison, if they charged 32 BE for Urfwick in the store (5 RP x 6,5), it wouldn't exactly be rare anymore either. ^^
_But I can't say that I agree with the 150K BE pricing. 100K, or even 75K, seems more reasonable. I can afford it either way, but it IS a question of value._
